net.openhft.chronicle.salt

Class Signature.MultiPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.salt.Signature.MultiPart
  • Enclosing class:
    Signature

    public static class Signature.MultiPart
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for signing multi-part messages composed of a sequence of arbitrarily-sized chunks
